price: Basi Firauni akataka kuwafukuza katika nchi. Kwa hivyo tukamzamisha yeye na walio kuwa pamoja naye wote.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا
footnotes: Firauni akashikilia uasi wake, akataka kumtoa Musa na Wana wa Israili katika nchi ya Misri. Tukamzamisha yeye na askari wake wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
